colorDepth.label: Color Depth
colorDepth.description: A number, representing the bit depth of the color palette for displaying images.

canvas2D.label: Canvas fingerprint
canvas2D.description: Two images are drawn inside of your browser with the help of html canvas. Rendering images can be different on different computers, due to differences in hardware and software. Thats why this is a good method to distinguish devices.

audioContext.label: Audio fingerprint
audioContext.description: The audio fingerprint uses the Web Audio API to sample a sound. Differences in hardware can lead to different sampling values. This is a good way to distinguish between different devices.
